content: 3 3 5 8 sts to right hand needle next 77 77 85 93 101 101 sts will be worked as front transfer rest of 91 107 107 115 131 147 back sts to waste yarn or spare needle now 77 77 85 93 101 101 sts on needle beg to work the front sts back and forth from now front 2 join yarn to the front with rs facing row 1 rs k5 work body patt to last 5 sts k5 row 2 ws k5 p to last 5 sts k5 repeat last 2 row 3 more times button hole row 1 rs k1 k2tog yo k2 work body patt to last 5 sts k2 yo ssk k1 button hole row 2 ws k5 p to last 5 sts k5 repeat row 1 & 2 6 more times then repeat button hole row 1 & 2 once more 14 row completed repeat last 14 row once more then repeat row 1 & 2 3 more times bobble all sts using ordinary bind-off method cut yarn back 2 place 91 107 107 115 131 147 sts on needle and join yarn with rs facing row 1 rs see pics below pick up and knit running thread behind the front 4 times then m1r work body patt to end m1l pick up and knit running thread behind the front 4 times 101 117 117 125 141 157 sts ©︎ 2019 yuko shimizu 5 1 turn over the front 2 pick up running thread behind the front 3 draw yarn through 4 repeat steps 2-3 four times 5 make 1 st from this backward loop 6 now you finish these 5 sts row 2 ws k5 p to last 5 sts k5 row 3 rs k5 work body patt to last 5 sts k5 row 4 rs same as row 2 repeat last 2 row 20 more times bobble all sts using ordinary bind-off method cut yarn left sleeve join yarn to the center of the left underarm pick up 24 26 30 32 34 36 sts from the front 3 sts from the waste yarn shoulder 32 34 38 40 42 44 sts from the back pmm 59 63 71 75 79 83 sts short row 1 rs slmm k1 work 2x2 rib 31 33 37 39 41 43 sts turn short row 2 ws make ds pm work 2x2 rib 10 sts turn short row 3 make ds pm work 2x2 rib to m rm work ds work 2x2 rib 2 sts turn repeat last row 5 7 11 13 15 17 more times short row 4 rs make ds pm work 2x2 rib to m rm work ds work 2x2 rib 3 sts turn repeat short row 3 once more then repeat last 2 row 5 more times next round rs pm make ds work 2x2 rib to m rm work ds work 2x2 rib to mm slmm p1 work 2x2 rib to m rm work ds work 2x2
